attributes.additional_details:
Dogs are not born with a bad bone in their body, they do not wake up and think ‘attack’ without a human telling/teaching them how to do this. 
I hear by propose Dogs Rights, let’s spin the baloney that government are trying to feed human brains.
1. Breeder Certification, visited by animal standards regularly. 
2. Dog Owner Certificate, given after attending a course on how to look after a dog. 
3. Fair and equal treatment, not the first answer ‘kill it and were give you £200’
attributes.background:
Why is the simple answer always to kill the dog? Innocent or guilty again the UK government blame our four legged friends, whether it be an XL bully or not. 
A dog for many many people is their life partner, their cuddle blanket, their reason to smile at the end of a tough day.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643033

Introduce licences, mandatory training and annual vet visits to own a dog: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643739
